VeriTextHero.heading: Academic integrity powered by intelligent AI
VeriTextHero.description: VeriText AI detects plagiarism, paraphrasing, and AI-generated content in student submissions. Integrates seamlessly with Canvas, Blackboard, Moodle, and more.

VeriTextBento.heading: Comprehensive academic integrity solutions
VeriTextBento.subheading: Everything educators need to maintain academic standards and detect plagiarism across all types of assignments.
VeriTextBento.feature1_body: Advanced algorithms detect sophisticated paraphrasing attempts, not just direct copying. Our deep learning models understand semantic meaning to catch students who try to reword sources.
VeriTextBento.feature2_body: Purpose-built for programming assignments. Detects copied code even when variable names are changed, supports 50+ languages including Python, Java, C++, and JavaScript.
VeriTextBento.feature3_body: Works seamlessly within Canvas, Blackboard, Moodle, Google Classroom, and Schoology. Students submit directly through your existing workflow—no new logins required.
VeriTextBento.feature4_body: Upload entire classes worth of assignments at once. Get comprehensive reports in minutes, not hours. Focus on teaching, not hunting for plagiarism.

VeriTextShowcase.heading: Built for your teaching workflow
VeriTextShowcase.description: VeriText AI plugs directly into your existing LMS. No complicated software installation. No training videos. Students submit assignments the same way they always have—you get plagiarism reports automatically.

VeriTextIntegrations.heading: Connects with your education platforms
VeriTextIntegrations.description: One-click integration with Canvas, Blackboard, Moodle, Google Classroom, Schoology, and more. No API keys, no developer required.

VeriTextCaseStudies.heading: Educators trust VeriText AI
VeriTextCaseStudies.description: Thousands of institutions worldwide rely on VeriText AI to maintain academic integrity standards.
VeriTextCaseStudies.stanford_description: How Stanford's Computer Science department reduced grading time by 60% while catching 3x more plagiarism cases.
VeriTextCaseStudies.mit_description: MIT leverages VeriText AI to maintain academic integrity across 2,500+ free online courses with minimal staff overhead.
